<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mature Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3445) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

</column>

---

You've raised your megafauna companion to be a more powerful force on the battlefield than most of its kind. The companion you gained through the Mammoth Lord Dedication feat becomes a [mature animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=155), granting it additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) action, your megafauna animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike. 

<title level="2">Mature Megafauna Companion leads to...</title>
[Incredible Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3448)
